lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, Jan. 1 (U.P.) -- British patrols clashed Wednesday with enemy patrols both east and west of the Mayu River near Rathedaung, twenty-five miles northwest of the Burmese port of Akyab, it was announced officially today.
abstract: raids Shwebo and Akyab areas; Brit-Jap patrol clashes near Rathedaung reptd; US planes raid Lashio
snippet: NEW DELHI, India, Jan. 1 (U.P.) -- British patrols clashed Wednesday with enemy patrols both east and west of the Mayu River near Rathedaung, twenty-five miles northwest of the Burmese port of Akyab, it was announced officially today....
